definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The weighted functions are obtained based on the use of completed systems of general solution of the corresponding homogeneous equations .
sentences.chinese: 权函数是得自对应的齐次微分方程的一般解和完备系。

sentences.english: His work remains mathematically in the realm of ordinary differential equations.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作在数学上就停留在常微分方程的范围。

sentences.english: The case of regular solutions of nonlinear PDAEs is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并研究了非线性偏微分方程组的解在正则部分的情形。

sentences.english: In the derivation both the induced vibration and couple vibration were considerd.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了浸入水中输运流体管道耦合振动微分方程。

sentences.english: In this paper, introduced the Differentiator Series Method to solve the five-dimensional wave equation problem.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍解五维波动问题的微分算子级数法。

sentences.english: The isoperimetric problem is one of the basic differential geometric problems.
sentences.chinese: 平面上等周问题是微分几何的基本问题之一。

sentences.english: This paper studies the initial boundary value problem for a class of quasilinear pesudoparabolic integrodifferential equations.
sentences.chinese: 研究一类拟线性拟抛物型积分微分方程的初边值问题。

sentences.english: The differential cross section of inelastic scattering has been calculated for a simple case.
sentences.chinese: 计算了在简单情况下的非弹性散射的微分截面。

sentences.english: The differential potentiometric stripping analysis at silver microelectrodes is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次报道了银微电极微分电位溶出分析法。

sentences.english: Lie algebras of derivations of n-differential operator algebra.
sentences.chinese: 元微分算子代数的导子李代数结构。

sentences.english: This method could also be applied in super-differential inequalities and equations.
sentences.chinese: 所用的方法也适用于时超微分不等式及方程。

sentences.english: Also we will discuss some differential identities in semiprime ring.
sentences.chinese: 同时给出了半素环的微商满足某些微分恒等式的结果。

sentences.english: Just in the language of differentials. The example that I promised.
sentences.chinese: 只是在用微分的语言表达，来看先前提到的例子。

sentences.english: In these differential equations, the concentration gradients of different reaction components are strongly coupled together.
sentences.chinese: 微分方程中各个反应组分的浓度梯度强烈相互耦合。

sentences.english: The present paper deals with a class of the nonlinear integro-differential problems with boundary perturbation.
sentences.chinese: 研究一类具有边界摄动的非线性积分微分问题。

sentences.english: This is a sophisticated differential signaling system that we haven’t previously known about.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个我们先前不了解的精密复杂的微分信号系统。
